title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 1 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 1 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
description:
Coming off of the Lakers loss to Memphis Wednesday night, Doug and TJ discuss the issues with the Lakers as they have dropped six of seven games. They talk about the complexities of playing with Lebron. The guys get into the matchup of the week in the NFL: The Bengals hosting the Chiefs. Former pro-bowl tight end Vernon Davis joins Doug and TJ to talk about what he has been up to since retiring from the NFL, namely acting in and producing films. The guys then break down the Ravens quarterback situation heading into their matchup this weekend with the Rams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
